Required for all merchant level requests(CB CNSC user calling global product related APIs)."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, merchant_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Add global item. Only for China mainland sellers using China Seller Centre(CNSC). More details in https://shopee.cn/cooperate/46/53/926.

error_list.name: add_on.add_on_deal_expired
error_list.description: The expired add on deal can't be edited

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Parameter is not match the constraints, {{.error_info}}.

error_list.name: error_incalid_brand
error_list.description: Brand ID or brand name required

error_list.name: error_busi_cannot_get_category_path
error_list.description: Get category path failed. please try later.

error_list.name: error_busi_add_global_item_failed
error_list.description: Add global item failed, please try later. {{.error_info}}

error_list.name: error_busi_global_item_dimension_over_limit
error_list.description: Global item dimension is over limit.

error_list.name: error_busi_global_item_weight_over_limit
error_list.description: Global item weight is over limit.

error_list.name: error_busi_global_tier_variation_over_limit
error_list.description: Global item tier_variation is over limit.

error_list.name: error_busi_global_item_tier_option_over_limit
error_list.description: Option of tier_variation is over limit.

error_list.name: error_busi_global_item_sku_over_limit
error_list.description: Global item sku is over limit.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_price_agp_too_large
error_list.description: the max price is 7 lager the min price

error_list.name: error_repeated_mtsku
error_list.description: A similar product has already been uploaded

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Attribute format is invalid. NCC field only allows Eng Alphanumeric input

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Global product related shop is not upgraded.

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: Wholesale cannot be used in this category and attributes.

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: Your current merchant is a special merchant.Please ensure all your shop are under same region

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Your shop can not use model level dts

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: You have 3PF shops, please upload stock with location id

error_list.name: error_busi
error_list.description: The merchant/shop has multi warehouse, please input location id

error_list.name: error_system_busy
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_stock_less_then_min_limit
error_list.description: Normal_stock/ seller_stock is less than min limit.

error_list.name: error_stock_bigger_then_limit
error_list.description: Normal_stock/ seller_stock is bigger than max limit.

error_list.name: error_incalid_category
error_list.description: Category IDs for L1 and L2 do not match.
